channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2 big unions balk at merger creating first U.S. transcontinental railroad

item.title: Researchers capture video of rare polar bear adoption

item.title: WATCH: 'H-Town Frankie' spreads holiday cheer with wild lights, music
item.description: One Texas dad is enjoying viral fame for his over-the-top Christmas light display.

item.title: US economy flashes warning signs in new data, some analysts say
item.description: The unemployment rate remains low but rose to its highest level since 2021.

item.title: What to consider about mortgage rate locks now, according to experts
item.description: Locking in one of today's lower mortgage rates may make sense, experts say, but there are some items to know first.

item.title: Investigators release additional video of possible Brown gunman as search continues

item.title: Video shows moments leading up to Nick Reiner's arrest after parents' deaths
item.description: Nick Reiner, 32, was charged Tuesday with two counts of first-degree murder in connection with the deaths, the Los Angeles district attorney said.

item.title: Brown mourns the loss of an aspiring doctor and campus leader to the campus attack
Brown University shooting leaves students, community frustrated with official response
